articles.title: How to live longer: The cholesterol-lowering drink that ‘significantly’ boosts longevity - Daily Express
articles.description: THE LIFE-PROLONGING qualities of fruits and vegetables are well known, with most of them attributable to the presence of phytochemicals. But one fruit, in particular, has proven particularly apt at lowering high cholesterol and boosting longevity.
